item.description:
IM returns to series of fun Sunday afternoon discussions on creativity, self-improvement, relationships, the arts, and a few surprises.

 

For this discussion, a bunch of IM regulars thought it would be fun to discuss and share the best and worst of our dating experiences.  What is the most romantic date you've been on?   What is the best date idea you've come up with?  What was your most surprising or unusual date you've been on?

 

What are some of the worst blind dates you've experienced?

 

Come join friends to discuss those experiences you remember fondly, or can now much later actually laugh at.

 

We do love our coffee.

 

The event will be from 1PM to 3PM.
item.name: Carpe Caffeine: Blind Dates II
